Articles.Content:
Hello all!

I've been lurking around this forum as a guest for some time now, reading various topics and the such and just kind of watching. Finally decided to register when I came upon a challenge topic that looked interesting to me. I've been playing KSP for quite some time, and hope to enrich my experience through this forum.

I'll see ya'll around the forum!
Hello plymoth45, and good luck with the challenge!

Welcome aboard, plymoth45.

Good luck with the challenge!
Hi I did the same thing for quite a while until I decided to go play the forum games!
Welcome to the forums! I originally signed up because of challenges too!

It's always good to lurk before you leap. Good luck with that challenge!

Welcome!
Lurking gives you the lay of the land before you dive in. Good call.
